name: categorize_server_roles
description: Categorizes a list of Discord server roles into predefined categories.

Programming_Language.description: A list of role names that are programming languages.

Experience_Level.description: A list of role names that represent an experience level.

Operating_System.description: A list of role names that are operating systems.

Tool.description: A list of role names that are tools.

Framework.description: A list of role names that are frameworks.
